Korle Bu Teaching Hospital - Ghana's Premier Referral Center

Services Available:
- General Surgery (24/7 emergency)
- Cardiothoracic surgery unit
- Pediatric care including NICU
- Maternity services with C-section capability
- Outpatient clinics Mon-Fri 8am-5pm, Emergency 24/7

Our Facilities:
We have modern CT scanner, MRI machine (currently under maintenance), X-ray units, ultrasound machines, and laboratory services. The hospital is equipped with 2 operating theaters for major surgeries.

Medical Staff:
- 45 specialist doctors including surgeons, pediatricians, obstetricians
- 120 registered nurses
- 15 anesthesiologists on rotation
- Laboratory technicians and radiographers

Referral Services:
We accept referrals from all district hospitals across Ghana for complex cases requiring tertiary care. Our ambulance service operates 24/7 for critical transfers.

Note: Some equipment may be temporarily unavailable due to maintenance schedules. Please call ahead for specific service availability.
